name: generate_bar_chart
description: Generate a horizontal bar chart to show data for numerical comparisons among different categories, such as, comparing categorical data and for horizontal comparisons.

data.description: Data for bar chart, such as, [{ category: '分类一', value: 10 }, { category: '分类二', value: 20 }], when grouping or stacking is needed for bar, the data should contain a `group` field, such as, when [{ category: '北京', value: 825, group: '油车' }, { category: '北京', value: 1000, group: '电车' }].

group.description: Whether grouping is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `group` is true, `stack` should be false.

stack.description: Whether stacking is enabled. When enabled, bar charts require a 'group' field in the data. When `stack` is true, `group` should be false.

style.description: Custom style configuration for the chart.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.

axisXTitle.description: Set the x-axis title of chart.

axisYTitle.description: Set the y-axis title of chart.
